phrases: The sound of the waves is clearer than usual, and the moonlight is very bright.
They gently surround me, filling me with warmth.
It is true...
If you are able to enjoy everything this world gives to you, then surely...
Dear Ai, autumn is quickly coming to an end here in Neo-Venezia,
and winter will soon be upon us.
Because Alice was promoted to Prima before us,
it is just been Aika and I at joint practice lately.
It is gotten really cold, has not it, Aika?
Huh?
Autumn is almost over, is not it?
Hey, Aika.
Yeah?
Does not practice with just the two of us remind you of when we first met?
I would be lying if I said it does not feel a bit lonely, but...
We just need to catch up to her, do not we?
All right!
Let us focus on becoming Primas, and do our best!
Huh?
Aika?
I am sorry, Akari.
I am sorry.
What?!
Why are you apologizing?
Well...
You have been dreaming of this day and working hard for it, have not you?
Congratulations on your promotion to Prima, Aika!
Thanks.
I knew you would say that.
Also...
What?!
Do you remember that day Oboeteimasuka ano hi o
When your heart suddenly began to race Futo kanjita tokimeki o
The rays from the blue sky were pouring over you...
Aoi hizashi abite
I could not look away, and when our eyes met Mitoreru to me ga atte
I could not help but smile Egao koboreta
It is just like a spiral Marude supiraare
As the days begin to swirl in brilliant colors Azayaka ni mawaridashita hibi
Always and forever, they are filled with love Itsumo itsudemo ai ga michiteita
Surely, it is a spiral Kitto supiraare
The days passed by, each one filled with warmth Atataka na mainichi o kasanetara
And before I knew it, off in the distance...
Itsunomanika tooku ni
Embraced By That Blue Sea And Wind...
My!
Aika was promoted to Prima?
Yes!
My, my!
Well, well!
That is wonderful news, is not it?
Yes!
Her alias is Rosen Queen.
The Queen of Roses!
So that is the one she chose.
Eh?
For a while now, Akira has been agonizing about when to give Aika her promotion exam.
Not only does Aika have to become a Prima,
but she will also have to carry Himeya someday, she said.
Ah, I see.
I am sure Aika will be fine, though.
Actually, I have another piece of good news.
A new Himeya branch will be opening near the Santa Lucia Station,
and Aika will be working there as the branch manager.
So, she said she will be really busy from now on.
But, I wonder why?
She should have been really happy about it, but Aika was in tears.
Akari.
Yes?
Your Prima Promotion Exam will take place tomorrow.
Okay.
President Aria...
I feel kind of nervous.
I cannot fall asleep.
Ai, my Prima Promotion Exam will finally happen tomorrow.
I am too nervous to fall asleep,
so even though it is the middle of the night, I am going to go practice for a bit.
Akari, it is finally time, huh?
I am getting kind of nervous, too.
Thank you for keeping me company, President Aria.
Calm down.
Just do what you always do during practice.
Huh?
That voice...
I dropped it!
Sideburns!
Hey, I am in trouble!
I dropped it!
I cannot believe I dropped it!
What happened?
I was on the way back from my middle school reunion.
And then I realized my wallet was gone!
I even had it tied to an elastic band!
But I still dropped it!
But hey, what are you doing out this late, Sideburns?
My Prima Promotion Exam is tomorrow.
So...
What?
I see.
I will be taking my promotion exam soon, as well.
So I know exactly how you feel, Sideburns.
Let us both do our best!
Akatsuki...
Right!
Hey, Akatsukin!
I found your wallet!
What?!
Where was it?
It fell in the restaurant toilet!
It fell in?!
It fell in!
Curse you, wallet!
How dare you fall in such a place!
Stupid thing!
I cannot even go to the bathroom in peace!
Calm down, Akatsukin!
Calm down!
Stupid thing!
I cannot even go to the bathroom in peace!
Calm down, Akatsukin!
Calm down!
You little!
Huh?
Akari!
You little!
You are practicing at this hour?
Ah, yes!
Sideburns!
Good luck on your exam!
You dropped it again!
I hope the weather does not turn bad.
I have to try and get some sleep.
Good morning, Alicia.
Good morning.
It is raining, is not it?
Yes...
Ah, but the sky is bright off in the distance.
It seems like it might stop in the afternoon, does not it?
Why do not we postpone the promotion exam?
This is an important day, after all.
Let us hold the exam another day when the weather is nice.
It is all right.
Eh?
I have been waiting for this day to come for a long time.
This is also the day you decided on for the promotion exam.
So today is already an important day to me.
Akari...
Although I guess it cannot be helped if it is still raining in the afternoon.
Akari.
Yes!
It stopped raining.
So, shall we begin?
Yes!
The preparations are complete.
I am at your service.
All right.
Thank you for waiting.
Now, please take my hand.
Right.
My, is this?
It is a hot water bottle.
My, my, such wonderful service.
Both the seat and the blanket are nice and warm.
Yes, yes.
Well then, off we go.
Between here and the Canal Grande, you can see the Campanile in many different locations.
But on a day when the rain has just let up, I recommend seeing it from this alleyway.
My!
Hey, Akari!
My, my.
This gentleman is one of the rowers in the regatta.
He makes his own oars.
That is right!
Carve out your own path, I always say!
You will regret it if you do not.
We are going to win it next year!
Good luck!
Gondola coming through!
We have finally reached the Canal Grande.
It is the great reverse-S-shaped canal that splits Neo-Venezia in two.
Are you cold?
Not at all.
This is Rialto Bridge, a bridge that spans the entire Canal Grande with its single arch.
It is a place where people crossing over the water and people enjoying the view cross paths.
Oh!
Here she comes, Akatsukin!
All right.
Hey, Woody.
Let us go ahead with our plan!
Got it!
Good luck!
Good luck!
Hurrah, hurrah, Akari!
Hurrah, hurrah, Sideburns!
Do your best, Akari!
Akatsuki, Woody...
Do your best, Akari!
A-A-Alicia, best wishes to you, too!
A-A-Alicia, best wishes to you, too!
H-Hey!
Get down from there!
You will fall!
My, my.
I see you gazing up at the endless sky Dokomademo tsuzuku kono sora nagameteru yokogao
Your long hair brushes your cheeks as it sways in the wind Hoho ni fureru nagai kami ga yureteiru

Ano koro mo i am about to mo zutto

Akari, that was a wonderful ride.
It was slow and gentle, as if the gondola became one with the water.
Alicia...
Now for the final course.
Our next destination will be wherever you choose.
After all, it is up to you to decide what kind of Prima you want to be.
What kind of Prima I want to be...
All right.
Say, Akari.
The moment when things begin to change is so mysterious, is not it?
Even though everyone is walking down their own path,
our changes are connected, as if we were all calling out to each other.
It is as though everything was fated from the beginning.
Alicia...
Alicia, we can see it now.
That...
That is my goal.
I want to be...
I want to be a Prima that embodies the Aria Company itself.
Akari.
Yes?
Ever since you came to Aqua, my world has completely changed.
My ordinary days...
The way I viewed the world...
They all began to shine, so wonderful and bright.
Yes...
As if a magic spell had been cast on them.
Just like the endless sky and sea that gently surround all of Aqua...
I am so glad that I met you.
Thank you...
Aquamarine...
The distant, endless blue.
Congratulations on your promotion to Prima, Akari.
Thank you very much, Alicia!
President Aria!
I did it!
I have finally become a Prima!
I have always...
From the first day I came to this planet.
Always.
Akari.
Yes?
I have something important to tell you.
Yes?
